name: artistry
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
great skill in creating or performing something, such as in writing, music, sport, etc.: You have to admire the artistry of her novels. Synonyms
prowess formal
skill

the special skills possessed by someone who has the ability to make art: No American composer has topped the sheer artistry, elegance, and wit of Cole Porter.
